column2: "Nyankopɔn tsena ɔsor mboanofo mu; Obu atsɛn wɔ enyame mu."

column3: Na hom bedzi aboa nyimpa bɔn no?"

column2: "Hom mfa pɛrpɛryɛ ndzi abɔbɔfo na ngyanka asɛm: Hom ndzi nsɛntsenenee mma ɔmandzehunyi na ɔkɔhweaban."
"Hom mper ngye abɔbɔfo na ehiafo: Hom nhwim hɔn mfi nyimpa bɔn no nsamu."

column3: nkyii so wɔnntse ase; Wodzi sum mu akɔnaaba; Asaase fapem nyinara rihim."

column5: Na hom nyinara yɛ Ɔsorsornyi ne mba."

column3: Na hom atotɔ dɛ mbapɔmba mu biara."

column4: bu asaase atsɛn; Na ɔwo na ibedzi adze wɔ amanaman nyinara mu."
